Posts.Content: i had grade 2 stage 3 er + pr + her2 x i had 3 fec and 3 tax follwed by 18 radiotherapy and 18 herceptin  and currently taking tamoxifan x i was diagnosed in 2008 and have had no secondarys x i dont mean to scare you but nothing is completely 100% perfect and everyone is different x
Posts.Title: Grade 3, ER+ PR+ HER2+

Posts.Content: hi i would defo love to do this i have posed for the daily mail for a breast cancer awareness shoot i have finished all my treatment and now have amazing boobs that i show to everyone so have no problems with having the photographed if it helps other ladies then im up for it i have added you on fb
Posts.Title: Amazonian Warriors - Challenge - Who wants to be in a calendar ??

Posts.Content: hi i had a groshong line fitted for all my treatment x its done under local anisectic [ excuse my spelling lol ] it was so much easier than having it in my hand all the time x you have to have it flushed once a week and can be done at the hospital or with the district nurse x i dont know how to put pics on here as i have a picture of mine so you couldve seen it x im on facebook if you wish to add me and i have a breast cancer folder where you can view all the pics x it goes in above your breast and you have a small tube hanging out which you have to keep covered at all times x you can have a shower or bath as the dressing they supply is usually waterproof x if you want to know more dont hesitate to ask x  hope it helps  melissa xx
Posts.Title: GROSCHONG LINE

Posts.Content: what your feeling is normal x your body has been thru alot and you will feel like that for up to a year afterwards x  you have to remember what chemo is and the damage it does to the body and the effects it has x from my own experience and a family members experience we have found that our body lets us know when we need to rest and if that means leaving the washing and going to bed then do it x you will feel better for it x    mel
Posts.Title: Is this normal ?
